Package ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook

OneBook is a user-to-user book exchange application that allows users to lend books they own to other users.

Package ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook Description

OneBook is a user-to-user book exchange application that allows users to lend books they own to other users. Users have the ability to search through and request to borrow any books in the database and be put on a wait list until the book is available for them. Users who own books have the ability to approve or deny requests to borrow. To assist with the borrowing transaction, users can view other user's profiles and send private messages to other users. Upon approval of a request, the borrowing user can see a map of the pick up location set by the owner.
